dictionary.title: Dictionary
dictionary.description: Manage custom words and phrases for correction and replacement.
dictionary.hero_description: Teach Codictate your unique words ‚Äî names, jargon, or terms it might mishear.
dictionary.modal_description: Add a word or phrase you want Codictate to recognize.
dictionary.fuzzy_description: When enabled, this turns your custom word into a correction rule. Codictate will automatically replace the incorrect version whenever it's dictated.
dictionary.replacement_description: Enable this to replace phrases with different text. Examples: 'chat gpt' ‚Üí 'ChatGPT', 'btw' ‚Üí 'by the way', 'my email' ‚Üí 'john@example.com'. Tip: match the word count (e.g. 'chat gpt' is 2 words, so it matches when you say 2 words).
dictionary.delete_confirm: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete this dictionary entry.
dictionary.empty_description: Add words to help Codictate learn your vocabulary.
dictionary.duplicate_error: This term or alias already exists in your dictionary
dictionary.aliases_placeholder: Type alias and press Enter or comma (e.g. shad cn)
dictionary.aliases_placeholder_replacement: Type alternate phrase and press Enter or comma (e.g. email address)
dictionary.aliases_help: Add alternate spoken forms that should map to this entry.
dictionary.aliases_help_replacement: Add alternate spoken phrases that should trigger this replacement.
dictionary.aliases_symbol_hint: For symbols, add a spoken alias (e.g. c++ -> c plus plus).
dictionary.aliases_help_tooltip: Add alternate spoken forms. For symbols, add spoken aliases like "c plus plus" for "c++".

quick_tips.tip1_description: Example: input 'shadcn' with aliases 'shad cn' and 'shad c n'.
quick_tips.tip2_description: Turn on "Replace with different text" for entries like 'btw' -> 'by the way'.
quick_tips.tip3_description: Set the replacement text with your desired capitalization (for example, ChatGPT).
quick_tips.tip4_description: If a term misses, add 1-2 aliases based on what you actually see in transcripts.

help_modal.title: Get Better Dictation Results
help_modal.description: Use these quick rules to make Dictionary entries trigger more reliably.

wpmEncouragement.zero: Start speaking to see your speed!

streakEncouragement.low: You're off to a great start!

tooltips.streak: Consecutive days with at least one transcription.
tooltips.wpm: Words per minute (average dictation speed). Calculated as total words / total duration.
tooltips.words: Total words dictated across all transcriptions.
tooltips.timeSaved: Estimated time saved vs. typing at 40 WPM. Formula: (Total Words / 40) - Total Duration.
tooltips.fillerWords: Total filler words (uh, um, etc.) automatically removed from your transcriptions.

fillerWords.label: Filler words
fillerWords.zero: Start speaking to see fillers caught!

startRecording.title: Start dictating
startRecording.subtitle: Hold fn to dictate and let Codictate turn your voice to into text

customizeShortcuts.title: Customize your shortcuts
customizeShortcuts.subtitle: Change the keyboard shortcuts for Codictate.

createMode.title: Create a mode
createMode.subtitle: Build the perfect mode for your workflow.

addVocabulary.title: Add vocabulary
addVocabulary.subtitle: Teach Codictate custom words, names, or industry terms.

hero.title: Hold fn to dictate and let Flow format for you
hero.subtitle: Press and hold fn to dictate in any app. Flow's Smart Formatting and Backtrack will handle punctuation, new lines, lists, and adjust when you change your mind mid-sentence.

onboarding.subtitle: To get started, choose a transcription model

attribution.question: Where did you hear about us?

tellUsAboutYou.title: Tell us about yourself
tellUsAboutYou.workQuestion: What do you do for work?

typingUseCases.title: Where do you spend your time typing?
typingUseCases.subtitle: This helps us tailor your experience.

accessibility.title: Allow {{appName}} to insert spoken words
accessibility.description: This lets {{appName}} put your spoken words in the right textbox
accessibility.tooltip: {{appName}} uses this to gather context based on the application you're using, and to access your clipboard temporarily to paste text.

microphone.title: Allow {{appName}} to use your microphone
microphone.description: {{appName}} will only access the mic when you are actively using it
microphone.tooltip: {{appName}} will play a sound and show an animation when the mic is active

skipModal.title: Permissions Required
skipModal.description: {{appName}} works best with both permissions enabled. You can continue without them, but some features may be limited.

microphoneCheck.title: Speak to test your microphone
microphoneCheck.subtitle: Your computer's built-in mic will ensure optimal transcription.
microphoneCheck.question: Do you see red bars moving while you speak?

dialog.title: Select Microphone
dialog.defaultDescription: Automatically selects the best available microphone

hotkeySetup.title: Press the keyboard shortcut to test it out
hotkeySetup.subtitle: We recommend the
hotkeySetup.subtitleEnd: key at the bottom left of the keyboard.
hotkeySetup.question: Does the button turn red while pressing it?

languageSelect.title: Set the language(s) you speak
languageSelect.subtitle: {{appName}} works in 100 languages.
languageSelect.description: Select the languages you speak or let {{appName}} detect them automatically.
languageSelect.makeActiveHint: Make this the default active language

modal.title: Languages
modal.subtitle: Select the languages you want to use with {{appName}}
modal.autoDetectMessage: Auto-detect is on. {{appName}} will try to detect the language you are speaking.
modal.autoDetectWarning: Auto-detect may be less accurate than selecting a specific language.
modal.clickToSetActive: Click a language to set as active

learn.title: Press the keyboard shortcut to use Codictate
learn.subtitle: Hold down on the
learn.subtitleEnd: key, speak, and let go to insert spoken text.
learn.inputPlaceholder: Hold down on the fn key and start speaking...

botMessages.greeting: Hey {{name}}, is Codictate working for you?

cannedResponses: That's great to hear! üéâ You just used push-to-talk. Now try hands-free mode - press fn+Space to start, speak, then press fn+Space again to stop.
Perfect! You're getting the hang of it! Try one more time - the more you practice, the more natural it becomes.
Awesome work! You can use Codictate anywhere you type - emails, messages, documents, code... the possibilities are endless!
You're a natural! Feel free to keep practicing, or press Continue when you're ready to start using Codictate.
You've got this! Ready to get started?
Looking good! Click Continue whenever you're ready.
Nice! You're all set to use Codictate like a pro.
Great job! Press Continue to finish setup.
Perfect! Let's get you started. Press continue to finish setup.

success.title: You've unlocked Codictate Pro üéâ
success.description: Enjoy 2 weeks of unlimited access on us

referral.title:
Give the magic of Codictate.
Get a month of Pro.

steps.theyGet: They sign up and get a free month of Pro!
steps.youGet: You get a free month when they dictate 2,000 words!

downloadModel.title: Download your AI voice recognition model
downloadModel.subtitle: {{appName}} works 100% offline. Your voice never leaves your device.
downloadModel.privacyNote: Once downloaded, no internet is required.
downloadModel.modelInfo: We've selected the best model for your system:

progressMessages.starting: Download started! Continue while we prepare your model...
progressMessages.inProgress: Downloading in background. Feel free to continue!
progressMessages.almostDone: Almost ready! Continue to the next step.
progressMessages.finishing: Nearly done! You can continue now.

downloadModel.error: Download failed. Check your connection and try again.
downloadModel.continueTooltip: Your model will continue downloading while you complete setup
downloadModel.defaultModelNote: {{modelName}} will be set as your default. You can change this anytime in settings.

parakeet-tdt-0.6b-v2.name: Parakeet V2
parakeet-tdt-0.6b-v2.description: English only. The best model for English speakers.

moonshine-base.name: Moonshine Base
moonshine-base.description: Very fast, English only. Handles accents well.

sense-voice-int8.name: SenseVoice
sense-voice-int8.description: Very fast. Chinese, English, Japanese, Korean, Cantonese.

modelSelector.downloadPrompt: Download a model below to get started with transcription.

modelSettings.title: {{model}} Settings
modelSettings.noSettingsNeeded: This model works automatically with no configuration needed.

shortcut.title: Keyboard shortcuts
shortcut.description: Configure keyboard shortcuts to trigger speech-to-text recording

transcribe_handsfree.name: Hands-free mode
transcribe_handsfree.description: Press to start and stop dictation

paste_last_transcript.name: Paste last transcript
paste_last_transcript.description: Paste the last thing you dictated

undo_last_transcript.name: Undo last transcript
undo_last_transcript.description: Undo the most recent transcript paste from Codictate

transcribe_with_post_process.name: Transcribe + Refine
transcribe_with_post_process.description: Hold to transcribe and automatically apply AI refinement.

refine_last_transcript.name: Refine Last Text
refine_last_transcript.description: Apply AI refinement to your last transcription and paste the improved version.

correct_text.name: AI Correct Text
correct_text.description: Fix homophones and errors in focused text using AI.

errors.reset: Failed to reset shortcut to original value
errors.multipleNonModifierKeys: Shortcuts can only have one main key. Use a modifier (Ctrl, Shift, Alt, Cmd) with a single key.
errors.modifierRequired: Shortcuts must include a modifier key (Ctrl, Shift, Alt, Cmd) or be a function key

reserved.app_control: Reserved for Application Control (Quit, Hide, Minimize, Preferences)
reserved.system_ui: Reserved for System UI (Dock, Force Quit, Log Out)
reserved.input_source_prev: Reserved for Input Source Switching (Previous Source)
reserved.input_source_next: Reserved for Input Source Switching (Next Source)
reserved.mission_control: Reserved for Mission Control & Desktop Navigation
reserved.system_focus: Reserved for System Focus Navigation (Check 'Keyboard Navigation' in Settings)
reserved.common_editing: Reserved for Common Editing (Copy, Paste, Cut, Undo, Select All)
reserved.common_file: Reserved for Common File Operations (Save, New, Open, Print)

language.title: Language
language.description: Select the language for speech recognition. Auto will automatically determine the language, while selecting a specific language can improve accuracy for that language.

models.title: Transcription Models
models.description: Select a transcription model or download additional models. Different models offer varying levels of accuracy and speed.
models.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete {{modelName}}? You will need to download it again to use it.
models.deleteActiveConfirm: {{modelName}} is your active model. Deleting it will stop transcriptions until you select a new model. Are you sure?

languageModels.title: Language Models
languageModels.description: Local AI models used to clean up, rephrase or translate the raw text.
languageModels.infoTooltip: All models are 4-bit quantized for efficient Apple Silicon inference.

microphone.title: Microphone
microphone.bluetoothWarning: Bluetooth microphones reduce audio quality significantly while dictating. We recommend using the internal or wired microphone.
microphone.bluetoothTooltip: Bluetooth microphones may offer reduced transcription accuracy due to lower audio quality. We recommend using a built-in or wired microphone for best results.

audioFeedback.label: Audio Feedback
audioFeedback.description: Play sound when recording starts and stops

volume.title: Volume
volume.description: Adjust the volume of audio feedback sounds

clamshellMicrophone.title: Clamshell Microphone
clamshellMicrophone.description: Microphone to use when laptop lid is closed

startHidden.label: Start Hidden
startHidden.description: Launch to system tray without opening the window.

autostart.label: Launch on Startup
autostart.description: Automatically start {{appName}} when you log in to your computer.

showTrayIcon.label: Show Tray Icon
showTrayIcon.description: Display the Handy icon in the system tray.

showUnloadModelInTray.label: Show "Unload Model" in Tray
showUnloadModelInTray.description: Show the "Unload Model" option in the system tray menu.

overlay.title: Overlay Position
overlay.description: Display visual feedback overlay during recording and transcription. On Linux 'None' is recommended.

pasteMethod.title: Paste Method
pasteMethod.description: Choose how text is inserted. Direct: simulates typing via system input. None: skips paste, only updates history/clipboard.

typingTool.title: Typing Tool
typingTool.description: Choose which Linux typing tool to use for Direct paste method. Auto will automatically detect and use the best available tool for your system.

clipboardHandling.title: Clipboard Handling
clipboardHandling.description: Don't Modify Clipboard preserves your current clipboard contents after transcription. Copy to Clipboard leaves the transcription result in your clipboard after pasting.

autoSubmit.title: Auto Submit
autoSubmit.description: Automatically send the selected key combination after text insertion. Cmd+Enter applies on macOS, while Windows/Linux use Super+Enter.

translateToEnglish.label: Translate to English
translateToEnglish.description: Automatically translate speech from other languages to English during transcription.
translateToEnglish.descriptionUnsupported: Translation is not supported by the {{model}} model.

modelUnload.title: Unload Model
modelUnload.description: Automatically free GPU/CPU memory when the model hasn't been used for the specified time

disabled.title: Refine is currently disabled
disabled.description: Enable AI-powered text refinement to improve your transcriptions with grammar, formatting, and polish.

autoRefine.title: Auto-refine all transcriptions
autoRefine.description: When enabled, every transcription is automatically refined. Adds 1-2 seconds delay.

appleIntelligence.title: Apple Intelligence
appleIntelligence.description: Runs fully on-device. No API key or network access is required.
appleIntelligence.requirements: Requires an Apple Silicon Mac running macOS Tahoe (26.0) or later. Apple Intelligence must be enabled in System Settings.
appleIntelligence.unavailable: Apple Intelligence is not available on this device. Requires an Apple Silicon Mac running macOS Tahoe (26.0) or later with Apple Intelligence enabled in System Settings.

baseUrl.title: Base URL
baseUrl.description: API base URL for the selected provider. Only the custom provider can be edited.

apiKey.title: API Key
apiKey.description: API key for the selected provider.

model.title: Model
model.descriptionApple: Provide an optional numeric token limit or keep the default on-device preset.
model.descriptionCustom: Provide the model identifier expected by your custom endpoint.
model.descriptionDefault: Choose a model exposed by the selected provider.

prompts.title: Prompt

selectedPrompt.title: Selected Prompt
selectedPrompt.description: Select a template for refining transcriptions or create a new one. Use ${output} inside the prompt text to reference the captured transcript.

prompts.promptInstructionsPlaceholder: Write the instructions to run after transcription. Example: Improve grammar and clarity for the following text: ${output}
prompts.promptTip: Tip: Use ${output} to insert the transcribed text in your prompt.
prompts.selectToEdit: Select a prompt above to view and edit its details.
prompts.createFirst: Click 'Create New Prompt' above to create your first post-processing prompt.

mlx.title: Local AI Model
mlx.description: Select a model for offline processing. All models are 4-bit quantized for efficient Apple Silicon inference.

history.title: History
history.clearAllConfirmDescription: This will permanently delete all {{count}} transcriptions, including starred items. This action cannot be undone.
history.empty: No transcriptions yet. Start recording to build your history!
history.emptyDescription: Recordings will appear here after you capture them.
history.deleteError: Failed to delete entry. Please try again.

aliasAction.failed: Failed to add alias. Please try again.

history.pruneConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to delete all unsaved recordings older than {{days}} days? This action cannot be undone.
history.pruneSuccessDescription: Successfully deleted {{count}} recordings older than {{days}} days.

filter.noStarredDescription: Star important transcriptions to find them here.
filter.noPeriodDescription: Try selecting a different time range.

logDirectory.title: Log Directory
logDirectory.description: Location where log files are stored

updateChecks.label: Check for Updates
updateChecks.description: Automatically check for new versions of {{appName}}

soundTheme.label: Sound Theme
soundTheme.description: Choose a sound theme for recording start and stop feedback

historyLimit.title: History Limit
historyLimit.description: Maximum number of history entries to keep

recordingRetention.title: Auto-Delete Recordings
recordingRetention.description: Automatically delete old recordings to save space

alwaysOnMicrophone.label: Always-On Microphone
alwaysOnMicrophone.description: Keep microphone active for faster response

appendTrailingSpace.label: Smart Insertion
appendTrailingSpace.description: Match sentence casing, clean trailing .?! when text continues, collapse duplicate boundary .?!, and add boundary spacing after words or .?!. Falls back to trailing space if context is unavailable.

fillerWordFilter.label: Remove Filler Words
fillerWordFilter.description: Automatically removes filler words (um, uh, hmm, etc.) from transcriptions.

hallucinationFilter.label: Remove Repeated Words
hallucinationFilter.description:
Removes repeated words and speech fragments caused by recognition errors.

Repeated words:
Before: "I want to cont cont cont cont continue"
After: "I want to continue"

Self-corrections:
Before: "the correction is dr f fu fuzzy matching"
After: "the correction is fuzzy matching"

pasteDelay.title: Paste Delay
pasteDelay.description: Delay before sending paste keystroke (in milliseconds). Increase if wrong text is being pasted.

whisper.title: Whisper.cpp
whisper.description: High-performance inference of OpenAI's Whisper automatic speech recognition model
whisper.details: {{appName}} uses Whisper.cpp for fast, local speech-to-text processing. Thanks to the amazing work by Georgi Gerganov and contributors.

accessibility.permissionsDescription: {{appName}} needs accessibility permissions to type transcribed text.

microphone.permissionsDescription: {{appName}} needs microphone access to transcribe your speech.

errors.correctionFailed: Correction failed. Check your AI model configuration.
errors.correctionReplaceFailed: Failed to replace text. Check accessibility permissions.

appLanguage.title: Application Language
appLanguage.description: Change the language of the {{appName}} interface

discoverability.title: Undo tip
discoverability.hint: Tip: Press {{shortcut}} to undo your last transcript within 2 minutes.

permissions.accessibilityLost: Accessibility permission was revoked. Auto-paste is disabled. Please re-enable in System Settings > Privacy & Security > Accessibility.
permissions.microphoneDenied: Microphone access was denied. Please grant permission in System Settings > Privacy & Security > Microphone.

accessibility.title: Accessibility Permission Required
accessibility.description: Codictate needs Accessibility permission to detect keyboard shortcuts and paste transcriptions. Please re-enable it in System Settings.

microphone.title: Microphone Access Required
microphone.description: Codictate needs microphone access to transcribe your speech. Please enable it in System Settings.

refineLastTranscript.disabled: Refine is disabled. Enable it in Refine settings first.
refineLastTranscript.failed: Refinement failed. Check your AI model configuration.
